activities.title: Awards
activities.content: Travel funding for attending Dagstuhl Seminar on Data Storytelling, Travel grant for attending Doctoral Consortium at IEEE Vis (InfoVis 2015), Faculty of Science Graduate Student Scholarship from University of Manitoba, More than 10 travel grants from University of Manitoba (Faculty of Graduate Studies, Faculty of Science, Graduate Student Association, and Department of Computer Science), Graduate Student Award from Department of Computer Science at University of Manitoba
